arts.ttl: Stephen Warnock delivers verdict on key decision during Nottingham Forest draw
arts.sum: He's had an interesting verdict on the decision.

arts.ttl: 'Not really' - Brighton assistant manager comments on Fabian Hurzeler red card in fiery draw to Nottingham Forest
arts.sum: With Brighton boss Hurzeler sent off in a dramatic game against Forest, Assistant Manager Andrew Crofts reacted to the decision.

arts.ttl: Forest unhappy with Morgan Gibbs-White dismissal in dramatic Brighton draw
arts.sum: Gibbs-Whiteâ€™s dismissal led to both managers also being dismissed.

arts.ttl: 'Not good enough': Roy Keane says Nottingham Forest player was abysmal vs Brighton
arts.sum: Not a great moment for the Forest man!

arts.ttl: 'I'll ask him when I see him' - Three red cards given in dramatic finale as Brighton held by Nottingham Forest
arts.sum: Brighton assistant manager Andrew Crofts said he did not know why Fabian Hurzeler was sent off in a dramatic finale to an entertaining match against Nottingham Forest.

arts.ttl: Four goals, three reds as Forest draw at Brighton
arts.sum: Highlights from Brighton's match against Nottingham Forest in the Premier League.

arts.ttl: Brighton and Forest slug out eventful 2-2 draw
arts.sum: Brighton and Nottingham Forest maintained their unbeaten starts to the Premier League season with a topsy-turvy 2-2 draw.

arts.ttl: Premier League release statement on 'unacceptable' Brighton vs Nottingham Forest incident
arts.sum: Three red cards were shown in quick succession during Brighton's draw against Nottingham Forest, with Morgan Gibbs-White and both managers dismissed at the Amex Stadium

arts.ttl: Brighton player ratings vs Nottingham Forest: local boy delights with 8; two 7s and one 5
arts.sum: Brighton and Hove Albion were held to a draw at Nottingham Forest in a game full of goals and drama (Sunday, September 22).

arts.ttl: Ramon Sosa rescues point for Forest with first goal in English football
arts.sum: The Paraguay forward was a summer signing from Argentinian club Talleres.
